title: Rachmaninoff: Prelude in G Minor
description: A live performance recording from the university auditorium. This piece challenges the dynamic range and rhythmic precision. I spent 3 months perfecting the middle section's lyrical phrasing against the marching rhythm.

title: Regional Chess Championship 2025
description: Highlights from the semi-final match. It was a rigorous 4-hour game utilizing the London System. Although it ended in a draw, the positional play was one of my best performances.

title: Cyber Security Lab Setup Timelapse
description: A short cinematic sequence showing the cable management and server rack installation for my home lab project. This setup runs Proxmox VE for my penetration testing environment.
